We’ve updated our smartraveller.gov.au advice for ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡° #HongKong:

Demonstrations are continuing in parts of Hong Kong. Confrontations have occurred between police and protesters, mainly on the weekends and in the evening. Expect road closures and public transport disruptions. Separately, attacks by reportedly criminally-linked individuals targeted commuters in the New Territories. Avoid demonstrations, monitor local media and follow the advice of local authorities. See Safety and security We have not changed our travel advice level - exercise normal safety precautions. #beinformed #beprepared

https://smartraveller.gov.au/Countries/asia/north/Pages/hong_kong.aspx

quote.msg: See Safety and security We have not changed our travel advice level - exercise normal safety precautions. #beinformed #beprepared

replies.msg: Large-scale demonstrations, and police action in response, have been ongoing on Hong Kong Island, in Kowloon and various suburbs in the New Territories. These have led to road closures and disruption to public transport, MTR stations and public spaces. Further demonstrations are expected. Separately, attacks by reportedly criminally-linked individuals have targeted commuters in the New Territories. Avoid large public gatherings, monitor local media and follow the advice of local authorities. See Safety and security

Demonstrations are continuing in parts of Hong Kong. Confrontations have occurred between police and protesters, mainly on the weekends and in the evening. Expect road closures and public transport disruptions. Separately, attacks by reportedly criminally-linked individuals targeted commuters in the New Territories. Avoid demonstrations, monitor local media and follow the advice of local authorities. See Safety and security We have not changed our travel advice level - exercise normal safety precautions. #beinformed #beprepared
